name: Bootstrapper
description: Sets up the default configuration for the aurelia framework and gets you up and running quick and easy.

comment.shortText:
A promise that represents the bootstrapper's startup process.
It resolves when the process has finished starting.

comment.returns: A Promise that completes when configuration is done.

comment.text: A callback which passes an Aurelia instance to the developer to manually configure and start up the app.
